title: Chemical Maker TPC Says Cerberus, Bayside Bond Lawsuit Falls Short
sub_head: Houston-based company says minority bondholders lack the 25% stake in a $930 million bond needed to pursue litigation
body:
Chemical maker TPC Group Inc. asked a bankruptcy court to find that investment firms Cerberus Capital Management LP and Bayside Capital Inc. can’t pursue litigation against the claims of other bondholders, saying that a combined 10% stake in a $930 million bond is too small to give the minority holders the right to sue.
